entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
